review: Loving the Fire Stick so far! We got it to use with our sling tv subscription.  Great picture and sound quality. Easy to set up and easy my Amazon fire app works well with it.
author: Brandon

review: Would be better if it had a browser and you could hook up to the Internet
author: laurence basche

review: The only thing I've watched is Bosch, but the fire stick worked fine.  It was easy to set up and I look forward to using it more.
author: CatWoman

review: only have Netflix but pic. was beautiful. & we enjoyed it very much. I might try amazon streaming some day tho .
author: Melody A Strait UP Fan of TheGeorgeStrait Fan Club

review: Awesome!  Excellent Amazon!! Worth every penny.  You guys did it again :)
author: JZW

review: I have a TV with built-in Internet TV, a Chromecast, PS3, and Fire TV stick.  Hands down, the Fire TV stick is my entire family's favorite.  It is simple to use.  The video quality has be great.  I have only used it for Netflix and Amazon Prime, but someday I will play with the video gaming function.
author: Netmask
